dct_description_sm: in book: Eptiome Geographiae Cluverianae Nova...Phillippi Cluverii? 1727
California as an island with indented northern coast and narrow center. Regio Incognita and Terra Iesso to north. Nova Guinea, Quiri Regio and many islands in Pacific.
Title cartouche with features copied from Visscher and de Wit. Includes snake above placque, standing native pointing to stacked gold and kneeling figure (bottom left).
Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
